modName: NEW Triss Merigold FOLLOWER UNP-CBBE From The Witcher 3 Game
summary: My personal version of Triss, with high quality textures and armor.
descriptionHtml:
[center][size=5][b] [color=#6aa84f]TRISS MERIGOLD [/color]

[size=3]Triss is a STANDALONE FOLLOWER which means no other mods will be required.
　You can use this mod with no problem whatever body types you're using.
[color=#93c47d][size=4](Facelight by tktk ever raccomanded)
[/size][/color][size=3]
[Follower detail]
[/size]
Name : Triss
Race : Breton
Voice : Even Toned
Body : UNP
Textures: Pride of Valhalla - Super HD Skin Set for UNP by Dracofish aka MelissaGT
(Midgard version)
Weight : 40
Default Armor : Triss hood down outfits
Default Spell : Fire Ball
Shouts: FireStorm
Location : Temple of Kynaret - Whiterun
Combat Style : Mage combat
[size=2][size=3]She is Merriable and unkillable
[/size]
[/size][size=4][Special Thanks]

[color=#93c47d][b]Dracofish aka MelissaGT[/b]
Calyps
Kalilies
Apachii
Zzjay
[b]Ousnius and Caliente[/b]
[/color]
